title: Enter your date of birth
description: As the appointee, enter your date of birth

error.dayRequired: Enter the day from your date of birth
error.monthRequired: Enter the month from your date of birth
error.yearRequired: Enter the year from your date of birth
error.invalid: You’ve entered an invalid date of birth. Enter your date of birth.
error.future: You’ve entered a date in the future. Enter your date of birth.
